00019 #ifndef SP_TEXTURED_GRID_H
00020 #define SP_TEXTURED_GRID_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00023 #include "SpStreamGeometry.h"
00024 
00025 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 namespace Spark
00028 {
00029 
00030 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class SpTexturedGridSg : public SpStreamGeometry
00034 {
00035 
00037 public:
00038 
00039     SpTexturedGridSg(
00040         int iRows = 10, int iCols = 10,
00041         float fMinX = -1.0f, float fMinY = -1.0f,
00042         float fMaxX = 1.0f, float fMaxY = 1.0f, float fZ=0.0f,
00043         float fMinS = 0.0f, float fMinT = 0.0f,
00044         float fMaxS = 1.0f, float fMaxT = 1.0f)
00045     :
00046         m_iRows(iRows), m_iCols(iCols),
00047         m_fMinX(fMinX), m_fMinY(fMinY),
00048         m_fMaxX(fMaxX), m_fMaxY(fMaxY), m_fZ(fZ),
00049         m_fMinS(fMinS), m_fMinT(fMinT),
00050         m_fMaxS(fMaxS), m_fMaxT(fMaxT)
00051     {
00052         // EMPTY!
00053     }
00054 
00055     virtual ~SpTexturedGridSg()
00056     {
00057         // EMPTY!
00058     }
00059 
00061 public:
00062 
00063     virtual void render()
00064     {
00065         float fWidth = m_fMaxX - m_fMinX;
00066         float fHeight = m_fMaxY - m_fMinY;
00067 
00068         float fCenterX = (fWidth / 2.0f) + m_fMinX;
00069         float fCenterY = (fHeight / 2.0f) + m_fMinX;
00070 
00071         float fDeltaS = m_fMaxS - m_fMinS;
00072         float fDeltaT = m_fMaxT - m_fMinT;
00073 
00074         float fCenterS = (fDeltaS / 2.0f) + m_fMinS;
00075         float fCenterT = (fDeltaT / 2.0f) + m_fMinT;
00076 
00077         float fDS = fDeltaS / m_iCols;
00078         float fDT = fDeltaT / m_iRows;
00079 
00080         float fDW = fWidth / m_iCols;
00081         float fDH = fHeight / m_iRows;
00082 
00083         // just use a single normal direction
00084         // for the entire grid
00085         glNormal3f(fCenterX, fCenterY, 1.0);
00086 
00087         float fS = m_fMinS;
00088         float fT = m_fMinT;
00089 
00090         //glBegin(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP);
00091         for (float fY = m_fMinY; fY < m_fMaxY; fY += fDH)
00092         {
00093             glBegin(GL_QUAD_STRIP);
00094             fS = m_fMinS;
00095             for (float fX = m_fMinX; fX < m_fMaxX; fX += fDW)
00096             {
00097                 glTexCoord2f(fS, fT);
00098                 glVertex3f(fX, fY, m_fZ);
00099 
00100                 glTexCoord2f(fS, fT + fDT);
00101                 glVertex3f(fX, fY + fDH, m_fZ);
00102 
00103                 fS += fDS;
00104             }
00105             fT += fDT;
00106             glEnd();
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     inline void setResolution(
00111         int iRows, int iCols)
00112     {
00113         m_iRows = iRows;
00114         m_iCols = iCols;
00115     }
00116 
00117     inline void setVertexCoordRect(
00118         float fMinX, float fMinY, float fMaxX, float fMaxY, float fZ = 0.5f)
00119     {
00120         m_fMinX = fMinX; m_fMaxX = fMaxX;
00121         m_fMinY = fMinY; m_fMaxY = fMaxY;
00122         m_fZ = fZ;
00123     }
00124 
00125     inline void setTexCoordRect(
00126         float fMinS, float fMinT, float fMaxS, float fMaxT)
00127     {
00128         m_fMinS = fMinS; m_fMaxS = fMaxS;
00129         m_fMinT = fMinT; m_fMaxT = fMaxT;
00130     }
00131 
00132 
00134 protected:
00135 
00136     int m_iRows;
00137     int m_iCols;
00138 
00139     float m_fMinX;
00140     float m_fMinY;
00141     float m_fMaxX;
00142     float m_fMaxY;
00143 
00144     float m_fZ;
00145 
00146     float m_fMinS;
00147     float m_fMaxS;
00148     float m_fMinT;
00149     float m_fMaxT;
00150 
00151 };
00152 
00153 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 
00155 }   // end namespace: Spark

00157 #endif
